paye.description: The list of the individualâ€™s PAYE data for the requested time period.

taxYear.description: The tax year of submission, format YY-YY.

employee.description: A collection of properties related to the employee in the submission

hasPartner.description: Will only be true if the partner object is present

payFrequency.description: The frequency of payments. W1 Weekly, W2 Fortnightly, W4 Four weekly, M1 Monthly, M3 Quarterly, M6 Bi-annually, MA Annually, IO One off, IR Irregular

weeklyPeriodNumber.description: The number corresponding to the week the payment was made. As pay dates may not align with calendar weeks, the range of permitted values is 1 through to 54 (inclusive), and 56

monthlyPeriodNumber.description: The number between 1 and 12, corresponding to the month the payment was made. As the tax year starts in April, so does the monthPayNumber, with 1 corresponding to April

taxCode.description: Number of normal hours worked. Pattern: ^[^ ].{0,34}$

taxablePayToDate.description: Taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits in kind to date in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

taxablePay.description: Taxable pay in this pay period including payrolled benefits in kind in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

totalTaxToDate.description: Total tax to date in this employment in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

taxDeductedOrRefunded.description: Value of tax deducted or refunded from this payment in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

employeePensionContribs.description: A set of properties relevant to employee pension contributions

paidYTD.description: Value of employee pension contributions to date in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

notPaidYTD.description: Value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

paid.description: Value of employee pension contributions paid under net pay arrangements in pay period in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

notPaid.description: Value of employee pension contributions that are not paid under a net pay arrangement in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

dednsFromNetPay.description: Value of deductions from net pay in pay period in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

statutoryPayYTD.description: A set of properties relevant to statutory pay for the year to date

maternity.description: Value for maternity in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

paternity.description: Value for paternity in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

adoption.description: Value for adoption in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

parentalBereavement.description: Value for parental bereavement in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

grossEarningsForNICs.description: A set of properties relevant to gross earnings for National Insurance Contributions

inPayPeriod1.description: Value in pay period one in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod2.description: Value in pay period two in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod3.description: Value in pay period three in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod4.description: Value in pay period four in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

payroll.description: Properties relevant to the employee's payroll

id.description: Identifier assigned by the employer to the individual. Pattern: ^[^ ].{0,34}$

paidHoursWorked.description: Tax code associated with the payment. Pattern: ^([1-9][0-9]{0,5}[LMNPTY])|(BR)|(0T)|(NT)|(D[0-8])|([K][1-9][0-9]{0,5})$

totalEmployerNICs.description: A set of properties relevant to the totals of employer National Insurance Contributions

inPayPeriod1.description: Value in pay period one in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod2.description: Value in pay period two in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod3.description: Value in pay period three in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod4.description: Value in pay period four in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd1.description: Value year to date one in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd2.description: Value year to date two in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd3.description: Value year to date three in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd4.description: Value year to date four in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

employeeNICs.description: A set of properties relevant to the employee's National Insurance Contributions due on all earnings

inPayPeriod1.description: Value in pay period one in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod2.description: Value in pay period two in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod3.description: Value in pay period three in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

inPayPeriod4.description: Value in pay period four in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd1.description: Value year to date one in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd2.description: Value year to date two in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd3.description: Value year to date three in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99

ytd4.description: Value year to date four in the range -999999999.99 to 999999999.99
